fields.description:
Blåu

Meet Blåu. She's one of the adorable characters from the Baby Monsters series at Hot Buttered Grits.

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

fields.description:
The "Botanica Exotica" Collection

Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

About the Designer, Andrew Marconi

Andrew Marconi is a Columbus, Ohio-based maker, digital designer and developer that finds inspiration in illustrations and global motifs from antiquity through the 1700s. He is the founder of 559 Labs a digital consultancy that focuses on enabling independent artists, small businesses and non-prfoit organizations.

Mug Details

This sturdy mug looks great and is an essential to your cupboard. It can withstand heat in the microwave and may be placed in the dishwasher without risk.

  • Ceramic
  • Dishwasher-Safe
  • Microwave-Safe
  • Glossy White Base
fields.short_description: Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

fields.description:
The "Botanica Exotica" Collection

Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

Mug Details

This sturdy mug looks great and is an essential to your cupboard. It can withstand heat in the microwave and may be placed in the dishwasher without risk.

  • Ceramic
  • Dishwasher-Safe
  • Microwave-Safe
  • Glossy White Base

fields.description:
Werple

Meet Werple. She's one of the delightful characters from the Baby Monsters series at Hot Buttered Grits.

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve One-Piece Details

This short-sleeve baby one-piece body suit is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

  • Made and printed in the USA
  • Neckband for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve Lap T Details

Made of 100% fine ring-spun combed cotton, this finer 1x1 rib knit features a comfortable stretch with excellent durability through repeated washings.

  • 100% Baby Rib cotton construction (Heather Grey contains 10% Polyester)
  • Neckband designed for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Made in the USA

fields.description:
The "Botanica Exotica" Collection

Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

About the Designer, Andrew Marconi

Andrew Marconi is a Columbus, Ohio-based maker, digital designer and developer that finds inspiration in illustrations and global motifs from antiquity through the 1700s. He is the founder of 559 Labs a digital consultancy that focuses on enabling independent artists, small businesses and non-prfoit organizations.

iPhone Case Details

This hybrid case combines a solid polycarbonate back, with flexible, rigid sides. It fits your phone perfectly, and protects from scratches, dust, oil, and dirt.

  • Made of a hybrid Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and Polycarbonate (PC) material
  • Solid, durable polycarbonate back
  • Flexible, rigid thermoplastic polyurethane sides
  • Precisely aligned cuts and holes that match your phone's functions
  • Easy to take on and off
  • 0.5 mm raised bezel that keeps your phone's screen and camera from scratching on surfaces
  • Printed in the USA

fields.description:
Gift Card Details

Can't decide on a gift? Running out of time? Get a digital gift card, and let the recipient decide!

How does it work?

It's easy to use. Just choose an amount and add it to your cart. Once you complete your transaction, you'll receive a code through e-mail that you can share with the recipient.

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve One-Piece Details

This short-sleeve baby one-piece body suit is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

  • 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
  • Made and printed in the USA
  • Neckband for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

Infant Baby Rib Long Sleeve One-Piece Details

This long-sleeve baby onesie is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

• 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
• Made and printed in the USA
• Neckband for easy on-and-off
• Not intended for sleepwear
• Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve One-Piece Details

This short-sleeve baby one-piece body suit is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

  • 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
  • Made and printed in the USA
  • Neckband for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

fields.description:
The "Botanica Exotica" Collection

Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

Mug Details

This sturdy mug looks great and is an essential to your cupboard. It can withstand heat in the microwave and may be placed in the dishwasher without risk.

  • Ceramic
  • Dishwasher-Safe
  • Microwave-Safe
  • Glossy White Base

fields.description:
Kibber

Meet Kibber. He's one of the fun characters from the Baby Monsters series at Hot Buttered Grits.

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

iPhone Case Details

This hybrid case combines a solid polycarbonate back, with flexible, rigid sides. It fits your phone perfectly, and protects from scratches, dust, oil, and dirt.

  • Made of a hybrid Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and Polycarbonate (PC) material
  • Solid, durable polycarbonate back
  • Flexible, rigid thermoplastic polyurethane sides
  • Precisely aligned cuts and holes that match your phone's functions
  • Easy to take on and off
  • 0.5 mm raised bezel that keeps your phone's screen and camera from scratching on surfaces
  • Printed in the USA

fields.description:
The "Botanica Exotica" Collection

Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

About the Designer, Andrew Marconi

Andrew Marconi is a Columbus, Ohio-based maker, digital designer and developer that finds inspiration in illustrations and global motifs from antiquity through the 1700s. He is the founder of 559 Labs a digital consultancy that focuses on enabling independent artists, small businesses and non-prfoit organizations.

Mug Details

This sturdy mug looks great and is an essential to your cupboard. It can withstand heat in the microwave and may be placed in the dishwasher without risk.

  • Ceramic
  • Dishwasher-Safe
  • Microwave-Safe
  • Glossy White Base
fields.short_description: Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve Lap T Details

Made of 100% fine ring-spun combed cotton, this finer 1x1 rib knit features a comfortable stretch with excellent durability through repeated washings.

  • 100% Baby Rib cotton construction (Heather Grey contains 10% Polyester)
  • Neckband designed for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Made in the USA

fields.description:
The "Botanica Exotica" Collection

Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

iPhone Case Details

This hybrid case combines a solid polycarbonate back, with flexible, rigid sides. It fits your phone perfectly, and protects from scratches, dust, oil, and dirt.

  • Made of a hybrid Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and Polycarbonate (PC) material
  • Solid, durable polycarbonate back
  • Flexible, rigid thermoplastic polyurethane sides
  • Precisely aligned cuts and holes that match your phone's functions
  • Easy to take on and off
  • 0.5 mm raised bezel that keeps your phone's screen and camera from scratching on surfaces
  • Printed in the USA

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

fields.description:
The "Botanica Exotica" Collection

Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

About the Designer, Andrew Marconi

Andrew Marconi is a Columbus, Ohio-based maker, digital designer and developer that finds inspiration in illustrations and global motifs from antiquity through the 1700s. He is the founder of 559 Labs a digital consultancy that focuses on enabling independent artists, small businesses and non-prfoit organizations.

Mug Details

This sturdy mug looks great and is an essential to your cupboard. It can withstand heat in the microwave and may be placed in the dishwasher without risk.

  • Ceramic
  • Dishwasher-Safe
  • Microwave-Safe
  • Glossy White Base

The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Long Sleeve One-Piece Details

This long-sleeve baby onesie is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

• 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
• Made and printed in the USA
• Neckband for easy on-and-off
• Not intended for sleepwear
• Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve Lap T Details

Made of 100% fine ring-spun combed cotton, this finer 1x1 rib knit features a comfortable stretch with excellent durability through repeated washings.

  • 100% Baby Rib cotton construction (Heather Grey contains 10% Polyester)
  • Neckband designed for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Made in the USA

fields.description:
Boski

Meet Boski. She's one of the cute characters from the Baby Monsters series at Hot Buttered Grits.

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

  • Durable rib neckband
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Unisex

fields.description:
Goober

Meet Goober. He's one of the boisterous characters from the Baby Monsters series at Hot Buttered Grits.

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

Pillowcase (with Filler) Details

This soft pillow is an excellent addition that gives character to any space. It comes with a soft polyester insert that will retain its shape after many uses, and the pillow case can be easily machine washed. And it's completely cut, sewn and printed in the USA.

  • 18" x 18"
  • Machine-Washable Cover
  • Concealed Zipper
  • Printed on Both Sides
  • 80% Polyester, 20% Fleece (Cover)
  • 100% Polyester (Insert)

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Long Sleeve One-Piece Details

This long-sleeve baby onesie is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

• 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
• Made and printed in the USA
• Neckband for easy on-and-off
• Not intended for sleepwear
• Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve Lap T Details

Made of 100% fine ring-spun combed cotton, this finer 1x1 rib knit features a comfortable stretch with excellent durability through repeated washings.

  • 100% Baby Rib cotton construction (Heather Grey contains 10% Polyester)
  • Neckband designed for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Made in the USA

iPhone Case Details

  • Made of a hybrid Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and Polycarbonate (PC) material
  • Solid, durable polycarbonate back
  • Flexible, rigid thermoplastic polyurethane sides
  • Precisely aligned cuts and holes that match your phone's functions
  • Easy to take on and off
  • 0.5 mm raised bezel that keeps your phone's screen and camera from scratching on surfaces

About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

fields.description:
The "Botanica Exotica" Collection

Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

About the Designer, Andrew Marconi

Andrew Marconi is a Columbus, Ohio-based maker, digital designer and developer that finds inspiration in illustrations and global motifs from antiquity through the 1700s. He is the founder of 559 Labs a digital consultancy that focuses on enabling independent artists, small businesses and non-prfoit organizations.

iPhone Case Details

This hybrid case combines a solid polycarbonate back, with flexible, rigid sides. It fits your phone perfectly, and protects from scratches, dust, oil, and dirt.

  • Made of a hybrid Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and Polycarbonate (PC) material
  • Solid, durable polycarbonate back
  • Flexible, rigid thermoplastic polyurethane sides
  • Precisely aligned cuts and holes that match your phone's functions
  • Easy to take on and off
  • 0.5 mm raised bezel that keeps your phone's screen and camera from scratching on surfaces
  • Printed in the USA
fields.short_description: Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve One-Piece Details

This short-sleeve baby one-piece body suit is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

  • 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
  • Made and printed in the USA
  • Neckband for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

Lloyd

Meet Lloyd. He's one of the boisterous characters from the Baby Monsters series at Hot Buttered Grits.

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

This tank top features a nice loose drape perfect for the summer heat or for layering. Made with fine jersey (100% cotton) construction (Heather Grey contains 10% Polyester).

fields.description:
The "Botanica Exotica" Collection

Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

About the Designer, Andrew Marconi

Andrew Marconi is a Columbus, Ohio-based maker, digital designer and developer that finds inspiration in illustrations and global motifs from antiquity through the 1700s. He is the founder of 559 Labs a digital consultancy that focuses on enabling independent artists, small businesses and non-prfoit organizations.

Mug Details

This sturdy mug looks great and is an essential to your cupboard. It can withstand heat in the microwave and may be placed in the dishwasher without risk.

  • Ceramic
  • Dishwasher-Safe
  • Microwave-Safe
  • Glossy White Base
fields.short_description: Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

fields.description:
Werple

Meet Werple. She's one of the delightful characters from the Baby Monsters series at Hot Buttered Grits.

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

All-Over Tote Details

Bring your favorite design everywhere you go.

  • 100% spun polyester weather resistant fabric
  • Dual handles 100% natural cotton bull denim
  • Bag 15" x 15" (38.1cm x 38.1cm)
  • Made in America

Glublub

Meet Glublub. He's one of the fun characters from the Baby Monsters series at Hot Buttered Grits.

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

iPhone Case Details

This hybrid case combines a solid polycarbonate back, with flexible, rigid sides. It fits your phone perfectly, and protects from scratches, dust, oil, and dirt.

  • Made of a hybrid Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and Polycarbonate (PC) material
  • Solid, durable polycarbonate back
  • Flexible, rigid thermoplastic polyurethane sides
  • Precisely aligned cuts and holes that match your phone's functions
  • Easy to take on and off
  • 0.5 mm raised bezel that keeps your phone's screen and camera from scratching on surfaces
  • Printed in the USA

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve Lap T Details

Made of 100% fine ring-spun combed cotton, this finer 1x1 rib knit features a comfortable stretch with excellent durability through repeated washings.

  • 100% Baby Rib cotton construction (Heather Grey contains 10% Polyester)
  • Neckband designed for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Made in the USA

fields.description:
The "Botanica Exotica" Collection

Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

iPhone Case Details

This hybrid case combines a solid polycarbonate back, with flexible, rigid sides. It fits your phone perfectly, and protects from scratches, dust, oil, and dirt.

  • Made of a hybrid Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and Polycarbonate (PC) material
  • Solid, durable polycarbonate back
  • Flexible, rigid thermoplastic polyurethane sides
  • Precisely aligned cuts and holes that match your phone's functions
  • Easy to take on and off
  • 0.5 mm raised bezel that keeps your phone's screen and camera from scratching on surfaces
  • Printed in the USA
fields.short_description: Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve One-Piece Details

This short-sleeve baby one-piece body suit is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

  • 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
  • Made and printed in the USA
  • Neckband for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve One-Piece Details

This short-sleeve baby one-piece body suit is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

  • 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
  • Made and printed in the USA
  • Neckband for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

fields.description:
Zytee

Meet Zytee. He's one of the amusing characters from the Baby Monsters series at Hot Buttered Grits.

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve One-Piece Details

This short-sleeve baby one-piece body suit is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

  • 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
  • Made and printed in the USA
  • Neckband for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

fields.description:
The "Botanica Exotica" Collection

Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

About the Designer, Andrew Marconi

Andrew Marconi is a Columbus, Ohio-based maker, digital designer and developer that finds inspiration in illustrations and global motifs from antiquity through the 1700s. He is the founder of 559 Labs a digital consultancy that focuses on enabling independent artists, small businesses and non-prfoit organizations.

iPhone Case Details

This hybrid case combines a solid polycarbonate back, with flexible, rigid sides. It fits your phone perfectly, and protects from scratches, dust, oil, and dirt.

  • Made of a hybrid Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and Polycarbonate (PC) material
  • Solid, durable polycarbonate back
  • Flexible, rigid thermoplastic polyurethane sides
  • Precisely aligned cuts and holes that match your phone's functions
  • Easy to take on and off
  • 0.5 mm raised bezel that keeps your phone's screen and camera from scratching on surfaces
  • Printed in the USA

The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

This short-sleeve baby one-piece body suit is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

  • 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
  • Made and printed in the USA
  • Neckband for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

fields.description:
Werple

Meet Werple. She's one of the delightful characters from the Baby Monsters series at Hot Buttered Grits.

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

Pillowcase (with Filler) Details

This soft pillow is an excellent addition that gives character to any space. It comes with a soft polyester insert that will retain its shape after many uses, and the pillow case can be easily machine washed. And it's completely cut, sewn and printed in the USA.

  • 18" x 18"
  • Machine-Washable Cover
  • Concealed Zipper
  • Printed on Both Sides
  • 80% Polyester, 20% Fleece (Cover)
  • 100% Polyester (Insert)

fields.description:
The "Botanica Exotica" Collection

Taking inspiration from Elizabeth Blackwell's "A Curious Herbal, Containing Five Hundred Cuts of the Most Useful Plants, Which Are Now Used in the Practice of Physick," published in 1739, this series modernizes her plant illustrations, drawn from London's Chelsea Physik Garden. The original collection was received favorably, and funded the release of her husband from debtors' prison.

Mug Details

This sturdy mug looks great and is an essential to your cupboard. It can withstand heat in the microwave and may be placed in the dishwasher without risk.

  • Ceramic
  • Dishwasher-Safe
  • Microwave-Safe
  • Glossy White Base

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve One-Piece Details

This short-sleeve baby one-piece body suit is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

  • 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
  • Made and printed in the USA
  • Neckband for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve One-Piece Details

This short-sleeve baby one-piece body suit is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

  • 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
  • Made and printed in the USA
  • Neckband for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Long Sleeve One-Piece Details

fields.description:
Walter

Meet Walter. He's one of the cute characters from the Baby Monsters series at Hot Buttered Grits.

The "Baby Monsters" Collection

Let us introduce you to the Baby Monsters Series, new to HotButteredGrits.com. How do these huge personalities fit into such small bodies? Unlike other mythological creatures, they are never ill-mannered or mischievious. Sure, they'll play a joke now and then... but it's always in good fun and never mean-spirited. They love to dance and sing, and tend to live outside of human sight. Fun, playful, and usually a bit confused, these creatures are curious but frighten easily.

iPhone Case Details

This hybrid case combines a solid polycarbonate back, with flexible, rigid sides. It fits your phone perfectly, and protects from scratches, dust, oil, and dirt.

  • Made of a hybrid Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and Polycarbonate (PC) material
  • Solid, durable polycarbonate back
  • Flexible, rigid thermoplastic polyurethane sides
  • Precisely aligned cuts and holes that match your phone's functions
  • Easy to take on and off
  • 0.5 mm raised bezel that keeps your phone's screen and camera from scratching on surfaces
  • Printed in the USA

fields.description:
About the Designer, Berker Sırman

Berker Sırman is an illustrator and visual designer living in İstanbul, Turkey. He's worked for many global brands, and now works in the service design industry for a major global consulting firm. His style is clean, colorful, sometimes minimal, and focuses on implied shapes and forms. He is active in the Istanbul digital start-up community and has contributed to many successful start-ups.

Infant Baby Rib Short Sleeve One-Piece Details

This short-sleeve baby one-piece body suit is soft, comfortable, and made of 100% cotton. It's designed to fit infants of all sizes, with a rib knit to give good stretch and a neckband for easy on-and-off.

  • 100% baby rib cotton construction (heather contains 10% polyester)
  • Made and printed in the USA
  • Neckband for easy on-and-off
  • Not intended for sleepwear
  • Shrinkage: it will shrink an average of one size when put in the dryer
